items.sentence: Tom is trying to repair an old clock that his grandfather gave him.
I don't think that Tom likes living in Boston as much as Mary does.
I don't think that Tom knows what Mary is supposed to be doing now.
I don't think that Tom knows what Mary and John are fighting about.
Tom texted Mary to let her know he was going to be late for dinner.
Everyone seemed to already know Tom and Mary were getting divorced.
Tom apparently hasn't yet told Mary that he isn't going to do that.
Something you should know about me is that I'm a creature of habit.
Who do you think will be the next person to walk through that door?
When Tom found out that the machine didn't work, he got very angry.
The eggplants looked so beautiful that I couldn't help but buy one.
The main islands of Japan are Hokkaido, Shikoku, Honshu and Kyushu.
I love looking at everyone's colorful kimonos on Coming of Age Day.
Tom got involved with people who had a really bad influence on him.
Mary can't stand it when Tom hovers around her while she's cooking.
Tom had to forgo his morning swim, on account of it being too cold.
Tom didn't know what had happened to make his leg swell up so much.
Tom came this morning and asked for my daughter's hand in marriage.
Did you really think that that was what Tom was going to give Mary?
Mary isn't the only girl who said she was interested in doing that.
